title: My client won't get past the  Authenticating  after logining on
body: All day today I login and My client won't get past the Authenticating after logging on, i tried to login just now and has been authenticating for 10mins now any help?

replies.body: I had the same issue. I added LoL to my list of firewall exceptions, and that worked for me.

This can happen if your connection is getting blocked to the authentication server, which is usually caused by a security setting or network change.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities and get in-game!
